page.title: 17 Further Education
page.content: The{Axe_Vale Further Education {Unit}in Seaton is going to have a major expansion. In Sept.1985 there will be a 50% increase in pupils.There are to be new classes and courses. There will be 700 on roll in September and a new Certificate _C.P.V.E. Certificate in Pre_Vocational Education. There will be a new Â£50,000 building and a new motor mechanics bay with help from the Manpower Services Commission. They will soon have a new computer called Cyclops. Students from Axminster, Honiton, Sidmouth and Colyton will be using these facilities.
